timeline.message:
MinecartData - fix issue with not returning correct minecart name due to missing matched pattern
- Also did some code cleanup, removing methods that were used wayyyy back in the day
- Also added command block minecart
VillagerData - fix issue with not returning villager type in string
MooshroomData - fix issue with not returning mooshroom type in string
DroppedItemData - fix issue with not returning drooped item type in string
EndermanData - fix issue with not returning enderman type in string
FallingBlockData - fix issue with not returning falling block type in string
FishData - fix issue with not returning fish type in string
FoxData - fix issue with not returning fox type in string
LlamaData - fix issue with not returning llama type in string
PandaData - fix issue with not returning panda type in string
ParrotData - fix issue with not returning parrot type in string
RabbitData - fix issue with not returning rabbit type in string
ZombieVillagerData - fix issue with not returning zombie villager type in string

timeline.bodyText: this seems like different functionality, I think before it updated the ZombieVillagerData object based on e but this is updating e based on ZombieVillagerData#profession. is that on purpose?
timeline.author: Pikachu920

replies.bodyText:
This method is used to set the zombie villagers profession.
Im not sure if it was written wrong before or what, but it didn't work. This fixes it.
replies.author: ShaneBeee
